title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-9.37 - Gravity return feed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-9.37 - Gravity return feed

State Regulations

In all cases where the returns are fed back to a boiler
by gravity, there shall be a check valve and stop valve on the return line, the
stop valve shall be placed between the boiler and the check valve and both
shall be as close to the boiler as practicable. Image

Image

Image

§§
14-9.37

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
